dataset_id: BOREAS TE-18 Landsat TM Maximum Likelihood Classification Image of the SSA
title: BOREAS TE-18 Landsat TM Maximum Likelihood Classification Image of the SSA
summary: A Landsat-5 TM image from 06-Aug-1990 was used to derive this classification, the objective of which is to provide BOREAS investigators with a data product that characterizes the land cover of the SSA. A standard supervised maximum likelihood classification approach was used to produce this classification.

citation: Sallaba, F.(2009). Potential of a Post-Classification Change Detection Analysis to Identify Land Use and Land Cover Changes: A Case Study in Northern Greece. Thesis.
